attributes.action: Present petition to the Queen to dissolve parliament for 12 months
attributes.additional_details:
Action requested by the people of the Queen:-
Dissolve parliament
Give them 12 months to get there act together, in the mean time tell Europe to wait or go WTO. no other option.
have a new Election in 12 months
attributes.background: It truly doesn't matter if you are a Brexiteer or a remainer or even if your on the fence still. This is an act by our government of denial of democracy, they clearly have have no intention of listening to the people. They promised many things and lie
